alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Jim Wells; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 1:50PM CST until February 04 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 degrees. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Jim Wells, Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces, Coastal Kleberg, Coastal Nueces, Aransas Islands, Kleberg Islands, Nueces Islands and Calhoun Islands. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight tonight to noon CST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
